long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Clownbulance Friends’ Fund extension allows you to seamlessly participate and fund the Clownbulance activity when purchasing on booking.com, GearBest and AliExpress – Without any additional cost to you.

All you need to do is add the extension to your Chrome browser and make future purchases from it.

When on a relevant website the extension will prompt a notification and then redirect you to participate automatically in the funding of the cause - this is done by refreshing the page you are on and landing on the same page in terms of the users' point of view but with the affiliate link to the Friends Fund affiliate ID - hence generating commissions to the Friends Fund platform which are shared with the Clownbulance.
